caption.p: Effect of plantain bulb extract-beverage-blend on nitric oxide level in the liver and kidney homogenates of streptozotocin (STZ)-induced diabetic rats. Bars represent mean±SEM (n=7). Values are statistically different at * P<0.05, ** P<0.01, and *** P<0.001 vs NC; # P<0.05, ## P<0.01, and ### P<0.001 vs STZ-IND; ††† P<0.001 vs STZ+ACA. Group abbreviations are the same as Table 1.
